wikipedia_page.main: Alan Price-Roberts or Alan Roberts (born 19 July 1946) is an English radio presenter, producer and actor.

response: | colspan="3" | Bryan Marshall as Adam Bell, Patrick Travis as Matthew, Amanda Hillwood as Lady Isabel, Charlie Condou as Martin, Leo Dolan as Moth, Alan Roberts and Chris Chivers as Outlaws

The original presenters were Alan Roberts (Head of Music) on Breakfast, Christopher Musk on mid-mornings, Eddie Vickers (Programme Controller) on the Lunchtime News and Topical programme, Laura de Vere on the Afternoon Show and Steve Ellis on Drivetime.  There used to be a Sunday lunchtime show where the presenter would go to various areas of Gloucester and share Sunday lunch with the residents of that house.
Allen, Allan or Alan Roberts may refer to:
*Alan Roberts (1946–2001), Scottish singer/songwriter/guitarist on Caledonia (Alan Roberts and Dougie MacLean album)
*Alan Roberts (filmmaker) (1946–2016), American cult film director and editor
*Alan Roberts (broadcaster) (born 1946), English radio presenter, producer and actor
*Alan Roberts, American voice actor on List of TaleSpin characters#Kit Cloudkicker during 1990s
*Alan Roberts (English singer-songwriter-musician) (born 1982), stage name Jim Noir
*Alan Roberts (1925–2017), Australian Marxist in Eco-socialism#1970s–1990s: rise of environmentalism and engagement with Marxism and socialism
